title: feat: waves in the background on touch
message:
feat: waves in the background on touch

Now when you touch the screen a wave is displayed from the touch
location that fills the screen with a new background color. The colors
are repeating.

Credits to the team behing qml-material for the Wave effect!

feature: better play sprites

fix: made play button in pause menu work

title: features: Improved pause menu and button tweaks
message:
features: Improved pause menu and button tweaks

Fixed color of button in info page and settings (I think, at this point I forgot
what I did) And also changed pause menu, to have a more homogeneous design

title: fix: player's sprite changing for no reason
message:
fix: player's sprite changing for no reason

Fixes the same bug commit 4b57fde was trying to fix, but this time it
should actually fox it. This is more of a workaround than a fix, but it
does the job reliably, it just sets the right sprite after everything
is respawned in Kloggr.respawnAll.

title: fix: game crashing when back button pressed
message:
fix: game crashing when back button pressed

A call to forceActiveFocus was missing.

title: refactor: respawnFarFrom now accepts an optionnal respawn function
message:
refactor: respawnFarFrom now accepts an optionnal respawn function

This allows to better respawn the lazers, and to remove a redundant
respawn function for the horizontal lazer.

title: feat: enemies now always respawn at a distance
message:
feat: enemies now always respawn at a distance

Reworked Square.respawnFarFrom to account for all angles of the
concerned object, not only those of the square respawning. Fully tested
with about 200 BasicEnemies and it worked.

title: fix: player's sprite changing for no reason
message:
fix: player's sprite changing for no reason

I didn't really find the bug, but fixed it anyway by resetting the
correct sprite on respawn, which should have been the default behavior
anyway. Also, some mini-changes.

title: fix: seeing things move during respawn
message:
fix: seeing things move during respawn

Now every gameobject is made invisible and non-collidable during the
respawn to avoid both graphical problems like seeing things teleport
during respawn, and also some potential collision problems as it's
really not clear when things run and this makes it a non-problem.

title: feat: in-game score display
message:
feat: in-game score display

The score is now displayed on the top left corner of the screen and
updated in realtime. The design of the text and its placement is
temporary, this is just to get something running.

title: chore: git now ignores the compiled binary
message: chore: git now ignores the compiled binary

title: feat: added french translation, translation support
message:
feat: added french translation, translation support

Enclosed all UI strings in qsTr(). Created a resource file for
translation files. Modified main.cpp to load translations.
Update strings to be translated with:
lupdate <file> -ts translations/<prefix>.ts
Translation is done with Qt Linguist (open *.ts file).
And then to update, lrelease translation/<prefix>.ts

title: fix: player appearing dead when reaching target
message:
fix: player appearing dead when reaching target

In commit 6df22f8 we didn't check if the thing the player collided with
was an enemy and changed it's asset everytime. Added check.

title: feat: change player face on death
message:
feat: change player face on death

Now when the player collides with something its face changes. The asset
used, deadPlayer.png is, at the time of this commit, crap. Our lord and
saviour Gabe will change it in a future commit.

title: chore: added missing files
message:
chore: added missing files

Added assets/lazer_horizontal.svg to qml.qrc and modified version of
normal lazer.

title: feature: horizontal lazer
message:
feature: horizontal lazer

Adds an horizontal (and green) lazer at level 15 that switches on and off
a bit faster (1.5s). It is added to the red, normal lazer. The respawn
function is duplicated from the normal lazer because of the this.y = 0
becoming this.x = 0. A better way would be appreciated.

title: refactor: lazer spawn/update/gen code
message:
refactor: lazer spawn/update/gen code

Time between states is now in Lazer.switch_time, it is generated in a
less error-prone way, removed useless height assignements.

title: fix: added a way to go back to menu on desktop
message:
fix: added a way to go back to menu on desktop

A previous change replaced pause button with the android back button but
did not provide a way for the desktops. Now it's the escape button.

title: feature: better screen transitions
message:
feature: better screen transitions

The animations are now contextual: if the thing to switch to is the main
menu the animations will go up, else down.

title: fix: RoundButton animation duration
message:
fix: RoundButton animation duration

title: fixed highscore position
message: fixed highscore position

title: type: remade score menu
message:
type: remade score menu

New management of score menu desig: highscore, time and score are displayed. Also has more of a material design look

title: fix: lazer not being collidable sometimes
message:
fix: lazer not being collidable sometimes

This was due to the lazer not resetting collidable = true when it
respawned. That code was misplaced (in updateState). It was moved to
respawn, and a function to set the state in a fool-proff way was added
and used where appropriate.

title: docs: added comments to numberOfEnemies
message:
docs: added comments to numberOfEnemies

Added the process to go from enemy density to the number of enemies to
display.

title: fix: lazer instant-killing player
message:
fix: lazer instant-killing player

The long-awaited bug fix is here! A short explanation of the bug:
- the player touches the target
- TargetReached is emitted
- (sometimes respawn)
- lazer is generated at a some unchecked position
- (sometimes respawn)
You see? Sometimes the Lazer would spawn (at a totally random position)
after things had been spawn, thus not placing it at a good position.
The fix: when generating the Lazer, respawn it immediately so there's no
possibility of bug.

title: style & feature: cleaned up and improved score
message:
style & feature: cleaned up and improved score

Cleaned up the code that calculated the score and highscore, things like
where it was calculated or simple style changes.
Removed scoreChanged signal because taragetReached was more appropriate
and because it would overlap with the new score variable and its
onScoreChanged signal.
Also added a new Timer that calculates the score based on the number of
points and the time once per second. It will be used to display the
score in-game and having it change in real time.

title: fix: buttons not rotating during animations
message:
fix: buttons not rotating during animations

The RoundButtons now rotate on click, rotate back if the click isn't
confirmed or if the button was already rotated (switches button).

title: refactor: cleaned up some highscore handling
message:
refactor: cleaned up some highscore handling

Style fixes, moved highscore calculation back into Kloggr.qml.
Removed 'bonus points' when points < 0.

title: type(feat): highscore now works with points
message:
type(feat): highscore now works with points
removed setEvent function for highscore in kloggr.js, and is now managed in kloggr.qml, also fiwed some confetti bugs

title: fix: target spawning inside enemy, moving between respawns
message:
fix: target spawning inside enemy, moving between respawns

Fixed a bug that caused insta-death when the player touched the target
when it had spawned on an enemy.
Also fixed a bug that caused the target to continue moving after
respawn, causing it to sometimes collide with the player 3 times in 1
second.

title: fix: acceleration not working (and too slow on mobile)
message:
fix: acceleration not working (and too slow on mobile)

The accel was previously unused. It is now used as a multiplier when
calculating changes in handleTouchMove.

title: fix: target spawing in enemies, killing player
message:
fix: target spawing in enemies, killing player

The Target could spawn inside an enemy, and when the player touched it
he would be killed. Now there's a check.

title: fix: changed size of gameobjects
message:
fix: changed size of gameobjects

Game objects were too big, it was a problem on mobile devices. Their
size has been reduced by 40%, and Player size by a bit more. Their size
is now stored in constants (kind of, thanks js). Also augmented base
enemy density to accomodate new sizes.

title: chore: renamed company in main.cpp
message:
chore: renamed company in main.cpp

Not just a simple change, it also makes players loose their
highscore/sound settings.

title: refactor: use new spawn functions, move highscore calculation
message:
refactor: use new spawn functions, move highscore calculation

BasicEnmy's respawn function now uses Square.respawnFarFrom to spawn
away from Player. Moved highscore calculation from Kloggr.collisionDetection
to Kloggr.score.set. It could be better yet, but at least it makes some
sort of sense now.

title: chore: bumped version to 1.2, changed package name
message:
chore: bumped version to 1.2, changed package name

The version bump is for all the fixes since the move from the web
version to Qml (that was version 1.0)
The package name change reflects our new company name, Creahoof!!

title: feature: the Target now avoids the Player
message:
feature: the Target now avoids the Player

The target now won't bounce in the direction of the player. For that, it
uses the functions added in the previous patch and adds the function
getRandomDirectionAvoiding(object) to Target. (if you have a better idea
for a name, tell me :D). Also, target now has a reference to player to
avoid finding it every update amongst the gameobjects...

message: chore: updated player png

title: feature: added links to social media buttons (Info.qml)
message: feature: added links to social media buttons (Info.qml)

title: refactor: made some math functions standalone, added some
message:
refactor: made some math functions standalone, added some

Moved functions like intersect, distanceTo... to standalone functions.
It made more sense to have them like this because many calls to them
were of the form Square.prototype.func.call(this, obj1, obj2).
Also added functions necessary to make Target avoid the player:
lineIntersect and lineIntersectRectangle.

title: fix: added icons to the project file
message: fix: added icons to the project file

title: feature: add icon to the app
message:
feature: add icon to the app

Added the icon files for the different screen densities and the big icon
for the playstore. Modified AndroidManifest.xml to use those icons.

title: fix: the speed of player/target is now consistent accros dpis
message:
fix: the speed of player/target is now consistent accros dpis

The number of pixel/s max etc is now calculated based on the pixel
density of the device, because the speed is specified in mm/s and
multiplied by the pixel density in update(). Also replaced
kloggr.pixelDensity with pixelDensity for better performance.

title: fix: the buttons in SettingsMenu now rotate everytime
message:
fix: the buttons in SettingsMenu now rotate everytime

Buttons now rotate at each click, not just the first one.

title: fix: app name is now correct, orientation locked to portrait
message:
fix: app name is now correct, orientation locked to portrait

Added a custom AndroidManifest.xml that specifies things like screen
orientation, application an package name... The company name is subject
to changes.

title: refactor: removed old code that is now unused
message:
refactor: removed old code that is now unused

Things removed:
 - Keyboard support that didn't work anyway
 - TimeChanged event and the code generating it (wasn't used)
 - Kloggr.draw(). Unused since web version as QML does the drawing
 - Useless state MainMenu from the web version
 - silent parameter in the Square.intersect function. It wasn't used
   but we have to find a replacement
 - See commit for things I forgot

title: docs: add documentation to everything in js/kloggr.js
message:
docs: add documentation to everything in js/kloggr.js

Added documentation in the form of comments, updated existing infos.
This is to prepare for the long period of inactivity when Kloggr is
finished.

title: feature: the target spawns further away from player
message:
feature: the target spawns further away from player

The target now uses the new function Square.respawnFarFrom to
spawn at least window.width/2 pixel away from the player.

title: fix: lazer spawning on player and killing him
message:
fix: lazer spawning on player and killing him

This patch adds the function respawnFarFrom to Square. It allows
to spawn an object at a minimum distance from another. The Lazer
now makes use of it, thus solving the spawn issue.

title: fix: potential bug when resizing game object
message:
fix: potential bug when resizing game object

Before this patch, when modifying the width/height of an object
it would count it in pixels, not in centimeters like in the
initialization, possibly causing collision bugs.

title: fix: lazer spawning too close/on the player
message:
fix: lazer spawning too close/on the player

This commit should fix the bug where the player could be insta-killed
by the lazer when the game objects respawn.
